dct_description_sm: auctore H. Kiepert ; lith. anst. v Leop. Kraatz, terrain v. J. Sulzer.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
6 bar scales on map given in "Schoeni aegyptiaci", "Milia passuum roman", "Milliaria germanica", "Stadia olympica", "Chiliometra", and "Milliaria anglica".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, twelve tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
"Atlas antiquus" -- top left corner. "Tab. III." -- top right corner.
4 inset maps: Tyrus, Alexandria, XII tribus Israelitarum, and Hierosolyma.
